# CharacterControllerStateComponent

**Structure**

A component that represents the state of a character controller.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CharacterControllerStateComponent
```

## Overview

RealityKit adds this component to an entity when you add a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CharacterControllerComponent] instance to it. Manually adding this component to an entity that has a character controller component has no effect because it’s redundant.

## Creating a state component

- **init()**

## Accessing character controller state

- **isOnGround**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the character controller is on the ground.
- **velocity**: The linear speed relative to the origin in physics space.

## Character control

- **CharacterControllerComponent**: A component that manages character movement.
- **CharacterControllerComponent.Collision**: A container that holds collision state for the character controller.
- **CharacterControllerComponent.CollisionFlags**: An option set that specifies which parts of the character capsule have collided with other objects.
